content: Multitool hardwood plunge cut blade BiM plunge cutting blade for the oscillating multitool, for plunge cuts in hardwood, laminate, plasterboard, and chipboard ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Multi-tool inserts- ### FEATURES:Features Increased versatility – quickly swap out plunge cut blade attachments to cover a wide range of base materials and applications More sustainable - adapt the Hilti SMT-6 multitool for different applications and base materials by switching inserts, without stocking multiple tools More flexibility – Starlock interface is compatible with all Starlock multitools on the market Easier to change inserts - Starlock compatible interface for a safer and more convenient tool-free insert change Applications BiM blades for plunge cuts and cut-outs in hardwood, laminate, plasterboard, and chipboard Expand the range of applications possible with the Hilti multitool ### TECHNICAL DATA: Additional Accessory Information: Starlock BiMetal hardwood plunge cutting blade, recommended for hard wood, laminate, and chipboard. 2 length x 1 1/4 width. Technical Data | Additional Accessory Information | Starlock BiMetal hardwood plunge cutting blade, recommended for hard wood, laminate, and chipboard. 2 length x 1 1/4 width. ### ITEMS- 2368501 - Plunge cut blade SMT BiM hardwood - Package Size 1 pc
